name: Executive Potty Simulator
description:
Play Mini-Golf on the golden throne of one of the most famous leader of this world while watching news channels or listening to smooth jazz. The five course Mini-Golf tournament contains obstacles from the president’s latest achievements like the Great Mexican Wall, The Chinese Trade War and more. It is planned to create several simulator inspired by famous leaders

Features
  • Immerse yourself in the Bathroom of the most powerful leaders
  • Play a 5 Track Mini-Golf Course based on the latest achievements of the president
  • Listen to Smooth Jazz
  • Watch the latest News on TV
Planned Improvements for US Version
  • Create own fake TV Channel Video 
  • Add artificial tanned hands
  • Menu and overall better user experience
  • add tweet mobile phone
  • add atomic suitcase to launch atomic armageddon
Planned Content (DLC):

There are further Exec Potty Golf Sim's planned with different presidents & interaction possibilities like for example a Kreml Nature Toilet or a Jong-Un Train Toilet Sim. The Kreml Nature Toilet Sim contains a Crossbow to hunt eagles & bears or a fishing rod to catch European fish. The Jong-Un Train Toilet Sim contains a basketball and joystick to shoot rockets while sitting on the dictators toilet in the train.

Downloadable Versions of the prototype

- Windows for Oculus Rift

- Mobile for Oculus Quest
